website-with-blog: A complete website example featuring a home page with hero section, features, and call-to-action, plus a dedicated blog listing page showcasing the BlogMainPage component with grid layout and pagination.
post-ai-web-development: A comprehensive blog post exploring the transformative role of AI in modern web development. Covers AI-powered code completion, automated testing, design tools, and practical applications. Features real-world examples, code snippets, and insights into the future of AI-assisted development.
post-getting-started-with-typescript: A complete blog post page about getting started with TypeScript, featuring a comprehensive guide with code examples, best practices, and related articles. Demonstrates a full-featured blog post layout with hero section, rich content, and engagement elements.
